title: What are the alternatives to QR Codes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Augmented Reality (AR) is the best alternative of QR according to me. We can also say that AR is an advanced version of QR. There were many limitations in QR like, at max you could have connected your website through the QR code. However, when it comes to AR, you can run a video, small game, 3D visualization. AR is a very new technology in most part of the world but you always have an early mover advantage. For more details related to Augmented Reality, feel free to contact.

Yet another code for QR codes, eh?The technology in augmented reality has already made a transition to markerless products. No more does the idea of staring and scanning at a code is of real interest to people.now its all about enhanced User Experience in which companies like Layar are doing extremely well because they replaced the ugly codes with markerless technology!
